Lines: Forces pre amassing in Odessa for upcoming sweep of Africa,
however we received intel that one of routed Zeon units is
hiding on our rear.
DeepL_mtl: Participating troops are gathering in Odessa for a major sweep of the African continent, which is scheduled to take place soon.
However, information was received that a defeated Zeon unit was hiding in the area to its rear.

Lines: You want us to locate and eliminate that unit?
DeepL_mtl: You want us to search for and destroy the enemy.

Lines: Given that they can still remain combat effective in this
situation means enemy commander must be very good.
DeepL_mtl: The fact that they are still functioning as a unit under these circumstances indicates that the enemy unit commanders must be pretty good at what they do...

Lines: Putting on last stand, surrounder and with
no supplies... its hopeless...
DeepL_mtl: They are forced to fight to the death in a desperate situation with no way to replenish their supplies....

Lines: That it is.
This time we're against a formidable enemy.
DeepL_mtl: It is safe to say that the enemy this time is quite formidable.

Lines: If we don't keep our guard up, we'll get knocked out...
DeepL_mtl: If we don't tighten up, we will get hit....

Lines: Our HQ treats ground sweep like an aftethough.
We should put our full force in final offensive.
DeepL_mtl: At HQ, we consider the ground sweep operation to be little more than a digestive game.
It is precisely in the final stages that we should be putting in extra forces.

_: TODO reword and split into two textboxes
Lines: By ignoring remnants on surface, who can't even mount a counterattack
anymore, we can concentrate on space offensive... I can understand
why General Reville plans to end the war at its roots.
DeepL_mtl: I understand General Reville's intention to put off the remnants on the ground, which cannot mount a major counterattack, and concentrate his forces in space...to end the war at once.

_: something about power seeking bastard? Or whining that plan to focus on space is crafty/soulless?
__: or warning Alan about internal powerstruggle?
___: chaning chat into foreshadowing to mission stuff?
Lines: There are many plotting sly dogs sitting in Jaburo
and in command of ground troops.
DeepL_mtl: There are many selfish raccoon dogs among those who remain at Jaburo and command the ground troops.

Lines: Haha... I'll be careful to not get dragged into any intrigue.
War is going to end soon, let's not get killed...
Unit 1, don't die on me!
DeepL_mtl: At the very least, I will be careful not to be so bewitched that I end up losing my life.
This war will be over soon....

Lines: Roger that!
